phase_name: Super-Mars Relocation AC-B1: Complete Phobos Pattern Implementation
goal: Execute full Phobos Pattern sequence: survey asteroids, deploy tugs with slag propulsion, position at L1, convert to hollowed depots. Establish orbital infrastructure before any planetary operations.
description: Implement the complete Super-Mars/L1-Depot hybrid strategy for Alpha Centauri B-1. Follow the [2026-01-08] Hollowed Asteroid Depot sequence: survey and select Phobos-class asteroids, deploy tugs with 90% efficient slag propulsion, achieve precise L1 positioning, convert hollowed asteroids to nuclear fusion-powered depots.

mission_log.name: Phase 1: Survey & Asteroid Selection (24 hours)
mission_log.description: Deploy system survey probes to identify 3 optimal Phobos-class asteroids (1.0-2.0 × 10^16 kg each) in AC-01 asteroid belt. Calculate L1 positioning trajectories and structural integrity assessments.

objectives.name: Deploy Survey Probes
objectives.description: Launch 12 survey probes to map AC-01 asteroid belt and identify Phobos-class candidates

objectives.name: Select Target Asteroids
objectives.description: Identify and catalog 3 optimal Phobos-class asteroids with structural integrity >95%

mission_log.name: Phase 2: Tug Deployment & Hollowing (12 hours)
mission_log.description: Launch 3 Asteroid Relocation Tugs equipped with slag propulsion systems. Begin hollowing operations on selected asteroids, collecting slag byproduct for 90% efficient propulsion.

objectives.name: Launch Relocation Tugs
objectives.description: Deploy 3 Asteroid Relocation Tugs with slag propulsion systems to target asteroids

objectives.name: Initiate Hollowing Operations
objectives.description: Begin asteroid hollowing with 70% slag production rate for propulsion fuel

mission_log.name: Phase 3: L1 Positioning & Stabilization (168 hours)
mission_log.description: Execute precision orbital transfers using slag propulsion (90% efficiency). Position hollowed asteroids at AC-B1 L1 Lagrange point with extreme navigational precision.

objectives.name: Execute L1 Orbital Transfers
objectives.description: Perform precision orbital mechanics to position asteroids at AC-B1 L1 point

objectives.name: Achieve L1 Stabilization
objectives.description: Maintain stable L1 positions with ballast mass >5.0 × 10^16 kg total

mission_log.name: Phase 4: Depot Conversion & Activation (240 hours)
mission_log.description: Convert hollowed asteroids into functional L1 depots with nuclear fusion power, crew quarters, and processing facilities. Complete Super-Mars infrastructure before planetary landing.

objectives.name: Install Nuclear Fusion Systems
objectives.description: Install 50 MW nuclear fusion power systems in each depot

objectives.name: Activate Depot Facilities
objectives.description: Complete crew quarters (25 capacity each), processing facilities (500 tons/day), and storage (100,000 m³ each)
